content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill is currently out of fuel
- Stone furnace is currently out of fuel

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)
- Stone furnace is currently out of ingredients

- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt is currently working

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are out of fuel
- Ensure that entities have a sufficient fuel supply before attempting to use them
- Regularly check entity statuses to prevent fuel depletion

### Errors when entities are out of ingredients
- Ensure that entities have a sufficient supply of ingredients before attempting to use them
- Regularly check entity statuses to prevent ingredient depletion

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that entities are properly connected before attempting to use them
- Regularly check entity statuses to prevent disconnections

### Errors when entities are not plugged into electric network
- Ensure that entities are properly plugged into the electric network before attempting to use them
- Regularly check entity statuses to prevent disconnections from the electric network

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked.
No important variables have been assigned.
